item.description:
Share your Cinco de Mayo adventures....real or imagined.
We'll have Extra-Strength Tylenol to help you recuperate.

The Cheesecake Factory has a large menu, so there's something for everyone!
A la cart menu item prices range from $5.95 to $27.95.
Brunch Menu http://www.cheesecake...

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks and tax.

Reservations are not accepted, so I will arrive at 10:30am to place Brunch Meetup on the wait list, with the HOPE, we can be seated by 11:00am, so you must BE PROMPT. We'll hang out at the bar until our tables become available. If there are thirty (30) of us, will plan for ten (10) per table.

Prudential Garage offers discounted parking with validation. Call 617-236-3060 for details.
Steps from the Prudential MBTA station on the Green Line.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Cheesecake Factory Brunch aka Post Cinco de Mayo Recuperation Brunch
